prompts.name: Workplace Health and Safety Policy
prompts.description: This template helps in constructing a robust workplace health and safety policy. Replace {{safety procedures}} with rules to maintain workplace safety, {{emergency protocols}} with steps to follow in case of emergencies, {{employee responsibilities}} with what is expected of staff, and {{training provisions}} with the planned safety training programs.
prompts.content: Devise a workplace health and safety policy outlining mandated {{safety procedures}}, detailed {{emergency protocols}}, clarified {{employee responsibilities}}, and comprehensive {{training provisions}}. Refrain from sharing details that could compromise strategic plans or protocols not yet approved.

prompts.name: Career Development Plan
prompts.description: This template facilitates the drafting of a comprehensive career development plan. Substitute {{development objectives}} with goals for the employee's career progression, {{development activities}} with the planned courses or programs, {{monitoring process}} with the means of tracking progress, and {{revision schedule}} with timings for plan reviews.
prompts.content: Develop a career development plan exhibiting clear {{development objectives}}, a broad spectrum of {{development activities}}, an established {{monitoring process}}, and a regular {{revision schedule}}. Please avoid including details of specific employee performance or potential sensitive career discussions.

prompts.name: Diversity and Equality Policy
prompts.description: Use this template to formulate a robust diversity and equality policy. Replace {{diversity commitments}} with your promises to promote diversity, {{anti-discrimination rules}} with policies to prevent discrimination, {{policy implementation}} with steps to ensure policy adherence, and {{compliance monitoring}} with your means of checking compliance.
prompts.content: Draft an all-inclusive diversity and equality policy that consists of our {{diversity commitments}}, strict {{anti-discrimination rules}}, comprehensive {{policy implementation}} roadmap, and efficient {{compliance monitoring}} techniques. Please skip details on individual discrimination cases or sensitive internal discussions.

prompts.name: Employee Skills Assessment Framework
prompts.description: This structure builds an employee skills assessment framework. Substitute {{assessment criteria}} with the skills or abilities to be evaluated, {{measurement scale}} with the rating system to be used, {{feedback mechanism}} with how appraisal feedback will be conveyed, and {{development plan}} with the strategy for addressing skills gaps found.
prompts.content: Construct an employee skills assessment framework powered with precise {{assessment criteria}}, a uniform {{measurement scale}}, a constructive {{feedback mechanism}}, and a proactive {{development plan}}. Do not share details of individual employee assessments or sensitive performance data.

prompts.name: Employee Well-being Programme
prompts.description: This template is for creating a comprehensive employee well-being programme. Replace {{well-being objectives}} with your goals for employee wellness, {{wellness activities}} with planned health and wellness events or initiatives, {{internal communication strategy}} with the plan for programme promotion, and {{programme evaluation}} with the method for gauging success.
prompts.content: Fashion an employee well-being programme that encapsulates our {{well-being objectives}}, an array of {{wellness activities}}, a strategic {{internal communication strategy}}, and effective {{programme evaluation}}. Abstain from sharing any personal health information or confidential data.

prompts.name: Conflict Resolution Protocol
prompts.description: This template is for creating an effective conflict resolution protocol. Replace {{conflict identification}} with the process to recognise and report conflicts, {{resolution process}} with your plan to manage conflict, {{roles and responsibilities}} with who should do what during conflicts, and {{follow-up procedure}} with steps to ensure resolution and prevent recurrence.
prompts.content: Formulate a conflict resolution protocol indicating comprehensive {{conflict identification}} steps, detailing an effective {{resolution process}}, assigning {{roles and responsibilities}}, and ensuring a thorough {{follow-up procedure}}. Please avoid including potentially controversial topics or specific past incidents.

prompts.name: Employee Recognition Program
prompts.description: This template helps in devising an employee recognition programme. Substitute {{recognition criteria}} with the standards for employee acknowledgement, {{reward options}} with your offerings for employee recognition, {{nomination and selection process}} with the process to identify and choose employees, and {{program timeline}} with the schedule for recognition activities.
prompts.content: Create an employee recognition program outlining clear {{recognition criteria}}, exciting {{reward options}}, fair {{nomination and selection process}}, and consistent {{program timeline}}. Steer clear of including specific employee appreciation situations regarding individuals that may imply favouritism.

prompts.name: Anti-Harassment Policy
prompts.description: Use this template to establish a comprehensive anti-harassment policy. Replace {{harassment definitions}} with explicit explanations of unacceptable behaviours, {{reporting procedures}} with instructions for filing harassment complaints, {{disciplinary actions}} with potential consequences for harassment, and {{support mechanisms}} with resources available for victims.
prompts.content: Draft an anti-harassment policy providing explicit {{harassment definitions}}, establishing straightforward {{reporting procedures}}, enforcing strict {{disciplinary actions}}, and offering supportive {{support mechanisms}}. Please avoid details of specific harassment cases or sensitive personnel matters.

prompts.name: Succession Planning Framework
prompts.description: This template facilitates the creation of a succession planning framework. Substitute {{role criticality analysis}} with the process of identifying key roles, {{candidate development}} with plans for potential successor readiness, {{candidate identification}} with the process of choosing suitable successors, and {{succession update cycle}} with the frequency of framework reviews.
prompts.content: Develop a succession planning framework entailing a comprehensive {{role criticality analysis}}, initiating a strengthening {{candidate development}} initiative, streamlining {{candidate identification}}, and adhering to a regular {{succession update cycle}}. Avoid focusing on specific roles or individuals as this may lead to bias or misunderstandings.

prompts.name: Workplace Etiquette Guidelines
prompts.description: This blueprint helps in cultivating workplace etiquette guidelines. Replace {{behavioural expectations}} with hierarchical conduct norms, {{communication protocols}} with preferred modes and styles of communication, {{conflict management}} with rules for handling disagreements, and {{courtesy reminders}} with polite behaviour reminders.
prompts.content: Compile workplace etiquette guidelines encompassing expected {{behavioural expectations}}, appropriate {{communication protocols}}, firm {{conflict management}} rules, and gentle {{courtesy reminders}}. Refrain from mentioning specific instances or individuals who may have violated these guidelines to avoid embarrassing or singling out employees.
